metadata.synopsis: Moe, Larry and Curly Joe (The Three Stooges) bring their head-knocking, eye-gouging antics to the Wild West. When reporter Kenneth Cabot (Adam West) heads to Wyoming to stop the slaughter of buffaloes, he brings the stooges with him. There, they trade barbs with Billy the Kid, Jesse James and Wild Bill Hickock, while Cabot gets elected town sheriff. But they'll need some help from Annie Oakley (Nancy Kovack) when it comes to foiling the criminal plans of a land-hungry frontier villain.

reviews: The last movie starring the Stooges.
